numlitem.para: Associated pump low PRESS lights are operative, and
Associated HYD SYS PRESS EICAS indication is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard affected SYS PRESS light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify associated L(C or R) HYD SYS PRESS caution message is displayed on EICAS.
Verify associated L(C or R) HYD SYS PRESS caution message is not displayed on EICAS.
